data.text:
Fantastic and modern hotel. So immaculate and it’s a brand new hotel in Dubai. They have only non-smoking rooms so it was perfect for me being sensitive to cigarettes’ smell.
Breakfast was also good I just really hope they will keep up this high standards. I will definitely come back again.
Staff were super friendly specially Tina. Always smiling and assisting guests. She was a star.
data.title: Superb hotel

data.text: This is the most beautiful hotel with the best architecture everything is perfect and I have stayed in more than 30 hotels in Dubai Miss Tina at front desk is the most lovely lady I have ever seen and most pleasant personality she should be training people in the entire hospitality industry as she is an expert
data.title: Ecos hotel is the best

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
We are all thrilled that you had a great time and all our # Experience Maker Tina made your stay unique and exceptional. 
It would be our great pleasure to see you back @ecosDubai🏨atAlfurjan
  
Rozma & Experience Makers
owner_response.author: Rafat  Gotta

data.text:
Very bad service even not delivered the food to the room even the customer is very tired or old man or lady can’t come down 
Don’t come to the poor services 
Before come to the hotel should ask about full services to avoid bad attitude and poor services
data.title: Very bad service

data.text:
Reception: 5+5 yıldız
Güvenlik: 5+5 yıldız
General Area Temizlik: 5 yıldız
House keep: 5 yıldız
Rooms: 5 yıldız
Kahvaltı: 4 yıldız
Waiters: 3 yıldız

Reception çalışanları kibar ve güleryüzlü. Size her konuda yardımcı oluyorlar. Güvenlik personeli çok iyi 24 saat güvenlik var ve size yardımcı olmak için hazırlar. 
Garsonlar yorgun😩 
Bir mekana ikinci defa gittiğinizde kalite oranını daha iyi anlıyorsun. İş seyahati için biraz merkeze uzak ama 1 km yakınında metro istasyonu var ve şehrin her tarafına gidiyor. 

Reception staff are polite and friendly. They help you and giving you good information. The security staff is very good there is 24 hour security and they are ready to assist you. Waiters are tired🫠

When you go to a place for the second time, you understand the quality ratio better. It's a little far from the center for business travel, but there is a metro station 1 km away and it goes to all parts of the city.
data.title: İkinci defa ecos otelde konaklıyorum.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
WOW! Thank you for amazing 4- Stars review!
It would be our great pleasure to see you back @ecos_Dubai_Hotel_at_Alfurjan
We will surely be looking forward to welcome you back soon 🙏.
Osama & Experience Makers
owner_response.author: Rafat  Gotta

data.text: I loved this hotel it’s very cozy and cute the rooms are clean and looks beautiful with the off white my kind of my style. And the staff are friendly and kind, Definitely will come back to this hotel. Thank you for the hospitality see you later..
data.title: My stay at the hotel
